sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Pedestrians with Disabilities Safety Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Pedestrians with Disabilities Safety Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. For purposes of this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. For purposes of this Act:

sections.heading: Mobility device; service animal; white cane.
sections.text: Mobility device; service animal; white cane.

sections.heading: Proclamation. Each year, the Governor is authorized and requested to designate and take suitable public notice of Pedestrians with Disabilities Safety Day (October 15) and to issue a proclamation which:
sections.text: Proclamation. Each year, the Governor is authorized and requested to designate and take suitable public notice of Pedestrians with Disabilities Safety Day (October 15) and to issue a proclamation which:

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2010.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2010.
